DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety effectiveness use fetal bovine dermis ( Cytrix ) treatment pelvic organ prolapse .
DOC.brief_title: Study Cytrix Use Pelvic Floor Prolapse Treatment
DOC.criteria: Female > 30 year age Willing able comply w/ study procedure provide write informed consent participate study . Diagnosed pelvic organ prolapse without pelvis floor dysfunction Patient willing complete PFDISF20 PISQ12 questionnaires 6 12 month postoperatively Patient willing answer phone questionnaires 2 week , 6 week , 3 month Patients history pelvic surgery ( cystocele/anterior repair , hysterectomy , vault suspension , etc ) prior procedure allow participate study except patient dermal graft implant . Patients , clinical judgment investigator , suitable study Patients , Investigators opinion , mentally legally incapacitate preventing informed consent unable read understand write material . Patients participate investigational study within 30 day study entry may impact analysis device previously participate current trial Patient whose pelvic organ prolapse Stage I Patient Diabetes Mellitus type I II Patient morbid obesity ( weight parameter determine physician ) Patient undiagnosed pelvic mass outside uterus ( expect functional nature ) Patient unexplained abnormal menstrual bleeding Patient acute chronic infection ( kidney , bladder , lung , etc ) Patient coagulopathy Patient participate investigational device drug study Patients must pregnant Patients life expectancy le 2 year Patients know suspected hypersensitivity collagen bovine product Patients preexist local systemic infection Patients history soft tissue pathology implant place Patients pathology would limit blood supply compromise heal Patient diagnose autoimmune connective tissue disease
